lines.text: Time to complete one cycle, unit: second
Number of cycles per second, unit: hertz (Hz)

secText:
Lesson:
1. Experiment with [OBJ:actsec_m376:making waves].
2. Describe examples of mechanical and electromagnetic [OBJ:expsec_m377:waves].
3. Describe [OBJ:expsec_m379:wave pulse and periodic waves].
4. [OBJ:expsec_m379555:Compare and contrast] amplitude, frequency, and period in waves and simple harmonic motion.
5. Describe the [OBJ:expsec_m386:wavelength] of waves.
6. [OBJ:expsec_m385:Describe] the energy and wave amplitude of a wave.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_36658:Calculate] the amplitude of a wave using a graph.
2. [OBJ:qc_36672:Calculate] the period of a wave using a graph.
3. [OBJ:qc_36669:Calculate] the frequency of a wave using a graph.
4. [OBJ:qc_36660:Calculate] the wavelength of a wave using a graph.
